alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 11:59AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central Nebraska and north central Nebraska, including the following counties, in central Nebraska, Custer. In north central Nebraska, Blaine and Loup. * WHEN...Until 100 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1159 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Anselmo, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Gates and Walworth. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
